msg: added unwind of reflection invocation exceptions

author: aadamchik
msg: select stored procedures finally work on Sybase

author: aadamchik
msg: stored procedures can be a mixture of modify and select operations, no need for 2 types
of queries, rather any stored proc should be handled the same

author: aadamchik
msg: generic query observer. initially will be used for reading StoredProc results
but has a chance to become the main generic observer, since it supports multople
results per query - something other implementations don't

author: aadamchik
msg: moved DefaultOperationObserver to util, since it is not intended for direct use
